example:
${bot.prefix}$${cmd.name}$ 5 + 6 / 2
${bot.prefix}$${cmd.name}$ Math.cos(Math.PI / 3)
${bot.prefix}$${cmd.name}$ x = 5; 5 * Math.pow(x, 2) + 2 * x + 7
